actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize reduced rate transportation for elderly people on a space-available basis.

summary.text: Authorizes under the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, reduced-rate transportation on a space-available basis for persons aged sixty-two years of age or older. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1373(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize reduced rate transportation for elderly people on a space-available basis.
